title: Evidence for Results for Hypertension Control at 12 weeks in QUARTET USA Trial Control Group

targetReference.display: Outcome Measure Report for QUARTET USA Trial

note.text: The statistic as reported appears to use the number of participants without missing data (24) as the denominator rather than the number analyzed (28) as suggested in the paper. Either way, the reported percentage does not match the value reported for this outcome in ClinicalTrials.gov results reporting (57.7% at https://fevir.net/resources/Composition/370504)
